name: Halloween Hustle
description:
Halloween Hustle is a 2D shooter, where the player controls a character who must fight their way through hordes of Halloween-themed enemies. Explore the dungeon, collecting as many weapons, abilities, and powerups as you can before time runs out. Then, survive for as many waves as you can!

Studio Libra

Joe Bagwell

William Hsiao

Jared Lumberg

Tim Machnacki

Peter Murray
